long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CleanFeed allows you to tidy up your news feed to your preferences.  Removes all adverts, subscription pop ups, sections of the paper you are not interested in.  Note CleanFeed is in a beta test phase, so you may experience anomalies!  If so, please use the Feedback button in the CleanFeed toolbar, or message us on hello@cleanfeed.news
